mapper.select:
select j.fid, fmaterial, fexternal_diameter, fwall_thickness, fnextExternal_diameter,fnext_material nextmaterial , fnextwall_thickness from tb_welded_junction j INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = j.fitemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
and ${str}
group by fmaterial, fexternal_diameter, fwall_thickness, fnextExternal_diameter,fnext_material,fnextwall_thickness

select * from ( select sum(fwarntime)/60/60 as overproof,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldtime,insf.fid companyid,insf.fname companyname,ins.fname caustname,ins.fid caustid,i.fid,i.fname from tb_warn l inner join tb_welded_junction j on j.fid = l.fjunction_id inner join tb_insframework i on l.fjunction_itemid = i.fid left join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fstatus=99
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
AND fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
AND fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by ${insftype},weldtime )temp

select * from ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(fstarttime, '%Y')
DATE_FORMAT(fstarttime, '%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d')
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime FROM tb_work WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime UNION SELECT
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime FROM tb_standby WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime order by weldTime )temp

SELECT i.fid,i.fname from tb_insframework i left join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where i.ftype=#{type}
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})

select * from ( select sum(num) overtime,companyid,companyname,caustname,caustid,fid,fname,weldTime from ( select case when SUM(fstandbytime)/60 >= #{num} then 1 else 0 end as num,insf.fid companyid,insf.fname companyname,ins.fname caustname,ins.fid caustid,i.fid,i.fname,
DATE_FORMAT(fstarttime, '%Y')
DATE_FORMAT(fstarttime, '%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d')
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime from tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by fmachine_id ,weldTime ) A group by ${insftype},weldTime )temp

SELECT j.fid,fwelded_junction_no fname,fitemid itemid FROM tb_welded_junction j inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.fitemId LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})

select * from ( select
sum(fworktime) / ( 12 *30 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 30 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 7 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, weekofyear(fstarttime)
AS weldTime,insf.fid companyid,insf.fname companyname,ins.fname caustname,ins.fid caustid,i.fid,i.fname from tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fmachine_itemid = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
AND fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
AND fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY ${insftype}, weldTime )temp

SELECT m.fid,fequipment_no fname,finsframework_id itemid FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on m.finsframework_id = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})

select * from (select SUM(fstandbytime) AS loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime,insf.fid companyid,insf.fname companyname,ins.fname caustname,ins.fid caustid,i.fid,i.fname from tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fmachine_itemid = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
AND fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
AND fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY ${insftype}, weldTime )temp

SELECT * from ( select count(mid) num,companyid,companyname,caustid,caustname,fid,fname,weldTime from ( select m.fid mid,insf.fid companyid,insf.fname companyname,ins.fname caustname,ins.fid caustid,i.fid,i.fname,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime from tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no)A group by weldTime,fid )temp

SELECT count(w.fid) from tb_welding_machine w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.finsframework_id LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid = #{id} or ins.fid = #{id} or insf.fid = #{id} or insf.fparent=#{id})

select SUM(fdyne) FROM tb_welded_junction where 1=1
${str}
SELECT fid,fname from tb_insframework where ftype=21

SELECT COUNT(distinct(fmachine_id)) loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime,ins.fparent fid FROM
tb_work
tb_standby
l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fmachine_id!=0
AND ins.fparent = #{parent}
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime,ins.fparent

SELECT COUNT(distinct(fmachine_id)) loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime,insf.fid companyid,ins.fid caustid,i.fid FROM
tb_work
tb_standby
l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE fmachine_id!=0
AND (i.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or insf.fid = #{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime,${insftype}

select sum(fworktime)/60/60 loads,fequipment_no fname from tb_work l LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine m on m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER join tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid LEFT join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
AND (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid = #{dto.parent} or insf.fid = #{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
group by fmachine_id ORDER by loads
DESC
LIMIT 10

select sum(fworktime) /60/60 loads,w.fname FROM tb_work l left JOIN tb_welder w on w.fid = l.fwelder_id INNER join tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fwelder_itemid LEFT join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
AND (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid = #{dto.parent} or insf.fid = #{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
group by w.fname ORDER by loads
DESC
LIMIT 10
